title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 6 categories on the x axis representing Video-on-demand Service, and Number of subscribers in millions in each Video-on-demand Service on the y axis.
Hotstar is higher than any other categories with value 63.0, followed by Voot, and Amazon Video. Down to category Ozee TV with the lowest value of 2.4.
The highest value at Hotstar is almost 26.25 times larger than the minimum value of Ozee TV.
The highest value at Hotstar is almost 26.25 times larger than the minimum value of Ozee TV.
The difference between the max Video-on-demand Service Hotstar and min Video-on-demand Service Ozee TV is 60.6.
